name: Bulk Delete Cloud Datastore
description: An Apache Beam batch pipeline that deletes Cloud Datastore in bulk. This is easier to use than the GCP-provided template.

parameters.name: registryEnvironment
parameters.label: The Registry environment.
parameters.helpText: The Registry environment, required only because the worker initializer demands it.

parameters.name: kindsToDelete
parameters.label: The data KINDs to delete.
parameters.helpText: The Datastore KINDs to be deleted. The format may be: the list of kinds to be deleted as a comma-separated string; or '*', which causes all kinds to be deleted.

parameters.name: getNumOfKindsHint
parameters.label: An estimate of the number of KINDs to be deleted.
parameters.helpText: An estimate of the number of KINDs to be deleted. This is recommended if --kindsToDelete is '*' and the default value is too low.
